name: IS Train Combat Assassin Gun
description:
IS Train Combat Assassin Gun are many mission to face the enemies and enjoy this epic sniper fps elite shooter experience. Sniper commando shooter has to play 4 different hardcore action missions to be the train shooter hero of this game. In this sniper shootout be the best by killing all the assassin shooter.
● HD stunning graphics bring together with realistic sound effects
● Thrifty hill train shooter experience
● Sniper scope simulation in 3D optimization
● FPS flexible game controllers
● Realistic mountain valley environments with varying light conditions
● Sniper FPS elite shooter experience
● Best Train shooting mission game
